db:section.db:title: auto qConstOverload(T memberFunctionPointer)
db:section.db:para: Returns the memberFunctionPointer pointer to a constant member function:

db:member.db:link: Differences between String-Based and Functor-Based Connections

db:section.db:title: auto qNonConstOverload(T memberFunctionPointer)
db:section.db:para: Returns the memberFunctionPointer pointer to a non-constant member function:

db:member.db:link: Differences between String-Based and Functor-Based Connections

db:section.db:title: auto qOverload(T functionPointer)
db:section.db:para: Returns a pointer to an overloaded function. The template parameter is the list of the argument types of the function. functionPointer is the pointer to the (member) function:
If a member function is also const-overloaded qConstOverload and qNonConstOverload need to be used.

db:member.db:link: Differences between String-Based and Functor-Based Connections
